Protocols/Tween.html.name: Tween
Protocols/Tween.html.abstract: A handle that provides state control and customization of a tween animation.

Protocols/Tweenable.html.name: Tweenable
Protocols/Tweenable.html.abstract: A type that can animate tweenable properties on itself.

Protocols/TweenableProperty.html.name: TweenableProperty
Protocols/TweenableProperty.html.abstract: A property that can be animated on a Tweenable type.

Classes/Tweener.html.name: Tweener
Classes/Tweener.html.abstract: A factory class to create, queue, and manage Tween animations.
